named-query.name: BC_READ_OFFERS_BY_AUTOMATIC_DELIVERY_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT offer FROM org.broadleafcommerce.offer.domain.Offer offer WHERE offer.deliveryType = 'AUTOMATIC' AND (offer.startDate <= :specifiedDate OR offer.startDate = null) AND (offer.endDate > :specifiedDate OR offer.endDate = null)

named-query.name: BC_READ_CUSTOMER_OFFER_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT customerOffer FROM org.broadleafcommerce.offer.domain.CustomerOffer customerOffer WHERE customerOffer.customer.id = :customerId

named-query.name: BC_READ_OFFER_CODE_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT offerCode FROM org.broadleafcommerce.offer.domain.OfferCode offerCode WHERE offerCode.offerCode = :code
